description: Buy Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots. FREE UK Delivery Orders over £50. NEXT Day Delivery Available from BRIGHTMINDS. Leading UK Online toys, games, gifts & books for children which inspire & entertain!

Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets Craft Kit Create Stunning Beaded Bracelets for Ages 8-14 This delightful Djeco Bead Loom Bracelets kit invites young crafters into a world of vibrant color and intricate design, making it the perfect way to spark creativity and a sense of accomplishment. Get ready for hours of engaging fun as children aged 8 to 14 can dive into the satisfying art of creating beautiful, personalized bracelets. The heart of this kit is the specially designed loom, a user-friendly tool that makes threading tiny glass beads an accessible and enjoyable experience. It’s the ideal platform for weaving together stunning patterns, much like the popular American Bead style, allowing for a sophisticated and stylish final product. Imagine the joy of selecting from eight vibrant tubes of colorful glass beads, each a tiny jewel waiting to be strung. Kids will have a blast experimenting with color combinations, mixing and matching hues to invent their very own unique patterns that truly express their individual style. This isn't just about making pretty accessories; it’s a wonderfully enriching activity that fosters crucial developmental skills. As little hands meticulously thread each bead, they’ll be enhancing their concentration and fine motor skills. The process of envisioning and executing a design encourages imaginative thinking and problem-solving, allowing their creativity to flourish. Furthermore, understanding color theory and pattern development subtly introduces them to basic design principles. The kit thoughtfully includes everything needed to get started right away: one sturdy loom, a generous assortment of eight tubes filled with glistening glass beads in a rainbow of shades, and two bundles of high-quality thread to bring all their beaded masterpieces to life. These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. It’s an invitation to play, to learn, and to create something truly wonderful with their own hands.

description: Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. Children copy the 3 designs in the instructions booklet to build courses, or make up their own - the possibilities are endless! This game is designed for ages 7 and over, and all the kits in the collection are compatible, for ever more inventive action-reaction courses! Construction game: children will need to use skill to position the pieces to make a course. Chain reaction game: children get to learn about the ingenuity and magic of chains of movement! Thinking game: children need to think about how fast pieces will move - which depends on the weight - and gauge the distances between them. Step-by-step instructions for 3 designs are provided to help children build their courses. Video accessible via a QR code. Invent endless courses for hours of fun! Play alone or with others. FSC® certified wood. 1 45-piece wooden building game with 5 metal marbles. Contents 1 24-page instructions booklet. Age 8+

Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description: Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. Includes multilingual guide. Drill design is U.S. patented. Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Ages 3 - 7.

Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description: Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. Includes multilingual guide. Drill design is U.S. patented. Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Ages 3 - 7.

Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations!
 Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. It’s an invitation to play, to learn, and to create something truly wonderful with their own hands.

Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. Includes multilingual guide. Drill design is U.S. patented. Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Ages 3 - 7.

Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

description: Djeco presents Zig & Go, a wooden building game of chain reactions requiring careful thinking. Children copy the 3 designs in the instructions booklet to build courses, or make up their own - the possibilities are endless! This game is designed for ages 7 and over, and all the kits in the collection are compatible, for ever more inventive action-reaction courses! Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

description: Zoom off to drilling fun with Design & Drill® Bolt Buddies® Race Car toy. Use the real-working drill to build your own race car and add the Race Car Driver Buddy to the driver’s seat for a thrilling drilling race to the finish line. Pull into the pit stop and get drilling. Plus, the box converts into a reusable playset! Turn it inside out for your own racetrack stadium. This race car construction set is ideal for pre-schoolers fascinated with racing and construction. Snap on the wheels and attach the bolts using the power drill, just like real racing pit crew. Pop the Driver Buddy in the driving seat with his Pit Crew Buddy, Monkey Wrench, behind him and off they go. Driver Buddy has changeable facial expressions. Ideal for practising fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination through play. Includes seven snap together race car toy parts, nine bolts, Race Car Driver Buddy with changeable expressions, Monkey Wrench the Pit Crew Buddy, and power drill. Keep the box! Each Bolt Buddies package unfolds to become a unique reusable playset for even more imaginative play fun. Modern chunky design makes the drill easy for little hands to grip and use. The toy power drill works just like a real one – you can even change the drill direction and see the gears turn. Race Car measures 20cm L x 9cm H. Includes multilingual guide. Drill design is U.S. patented. Drill requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Ages 3 - 7.

Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work.

 This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.

Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

description: Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains; The Bee Barn Natural Nesting Hay A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees Lovingly packed in our Gift Box Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain. Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds. Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees. This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.
